name: ELEMENTAL - 3x Earth Starter Pack
description:
The Elemental Trading Card Game!

This collectible contains 3 Fire Starter Packs, each Starter Pack contains 5 random cards within them and can be traded or used to play the upcoming game Elemental.

Elemental is a trading card game that players build decks of 20-50 Elemental cards with and battle opponents using the elements to their advantage!

These packs won't be available for opening until our Beta is released to the public and once packs are opened the pack opener will receive random cards pertaining to the pack type and they can never be reused to obtain more Elemental cards after being opened. But, the individual cards can be traded, sold, and used to play.

We are releasing these 3x Starter Packs early at a discount to show our thanks to our early supporters of the game! The pre-release card sale will have each pack worth 5tezos (1tezos per card), but here we are giving our supporters 3 packs for 5tezos!

We will not be minting a lot as we are still cleaning up bugs for the game, this is just to show our support to all the early supporters!

Thank you all so much and follow us on Twitter for updates on the team, demo, and release of Elemental TCG!

Twitter: https://twitter.com/ElementalTCG
